name: Click Drop：Money Rain
description:
In this game,you can experience to brush countless money to make money.
Swipe hard!

The faster you slide, the more money you make!

Let's try to see how fast you can swipe and how much money you can make?

What you need to do?
-Swipe your finger to earn money!

Pay attention to upgrading your wallet!
Will bring you extra wealth!

Come and download Click Drop: Money Rain,you can make money with your fingers in your leisure time!
